short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your progress and subsequent rage quit when you've had enough of Wordle for the day.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you love playing Wordle, but sometimes just want to rage quit and call it done for the day? Do you still want to share your results with your friends and colleagues anyway?

World Rage Quit is an extension that adds a "Rage Quit" button to Wordle's statistics/share dialogue. With just one click, you can copy your progress and the moment when you rage quit to your clipboard and share anywhere.

----

Example of what you can share after installing this extension:

Wordle 108 RAGE QUIT
⬜️⬜️🟨⬜️⬜️
🟨🟨⬜️⬜️⬜️
🟩⬜️🟨⬜️⬜️
💣🌀⁉️🤬💥
